varlistentry.term: Global SCIPcreateEmptyRow (SCIP *scip, SCIP_ROW **row, const char *name, SCIP_Real lhs, SCIP_Real rhs, SCIP_Bool local, SCIP_Bool modifiable, SCIP_Bool removable)

listitem.para: Please use SCIPcreateEmptyRowCons() or SCIPcreateEmptyRowSepa() when calling from a constraint handler or separator in order to facilitate correct statistics. If the call is from neither a constraint handler or separator, use SCIPcreateEmptyRowUnspec().

varlistentry.term: Global SCIPcreateRow (SCIP *scip, SCIP_ROW **row, const char *name, int len, SCIP_COL **cols, SCIP_Real *vals, SCIP_Real lhs, SCIP_Real rhs, SCIP_Bool local, SCIP_Bool modifiable, SCIP_Bool removable)

listitem.para: Please use SCIPcreateRowCons() or SCIPcreateRowSepa() when calling from a constraint handler or separator in order to facilitate correct statistics. If the call is from neither a constraint handler or separator, use SCIPcreateRowUnspec().
